reviews.review: People can argue until they're blue in the face over whether narrative or gameplay is more important for a great gaming experience. Luckily for everyone, this game excels in both regards.
One of the best ends to a series that blew my mind from start to finish. Play 1 through 3 if you can :)
Amazing story and beatiful graphics.
Oh this game is just beautiful. Awesome story, fun gameplay and the first game where you dont have to keep your companion alive (stupid escord missions). No she is very helpfull and charming.
Тот момент, когда не жалко потраченного времени!

A : WHOOOAAAAAAA, DUDE!

Breathtaking experiente. I love this game :)
absolutely a great game that anyone should try dont worry if you havent player others bioshocks (neither have i) Great gameplay and amazing strory 10/10
Absolutely "Whoooaaaaaaa, dude!"

Great game, deserving the “Whoooaaaaaaa, dude!” Award!

it has best story.
you must buy and play

Kevin Levigne es un genio de la narrativa, te envuelve en todos sus universos con gran facilidad. En la saga Bioshock, a parte de encontrarte un gran shooter, te encontraras con increibles tramas y personajes.
优秀的剧情  唯美的音乐  优良的画面  但是，我还是得看解析才知道讲了啥。
Cutest sidekick ever. 10/10

被朋友强烈安利生化奇兵无限
乘着打折入了个大包。
刚开始玩云里雾里，感觉什么都很神秘，世界观也不是很懂
不过一直有伊丽莎白（女儿）陪着，慢慢探索还是蛮有意思的嘛！

然而

接着海葬的dlc玩下去，突然发现整个事情并不是这么简单！
于是又去玩了前作
整个三部曲完美的形成了一个闭环。
真的是太棒了！深入世界观和剧情无法自拔！

其中的艺术设定也十分出色
装饰艺术风格完美还原了一战后发达的美帝，代入感超强
吹一波艺术品
不过分
เป็นเกมส์ที่สนุกสุดๆ เอาเรื่องเวลาและมิติมาเล่นได้อย่างลงตัวมากกๆ
Это одна из лучщий игр в которую я играл
최고의 게임

Colorfully anachronistic.
Mind bending desperation.
Excellent from beginning to end.

Great story, great art, great characters, great game physics.
If you are into narrative story and enjoy shooting things you should definitely buy this game!

This game is literally timeless, still has very impressive graphics for it's age and despite being somewhat linear, I still find myself going back again and again to play the story over one more time. The plot was debatable in the community as to the quality of it, but I for one absolutely loved the story and the Bioshock series' notorious twists that always leave you wondering what is coming up next. Still one of my favourite games!
拥有最好的ai，也是最好的单机游戏之一。[spoiler] 虽然是为了投票的徽章才写的[/spoiler]
剧情真的太赞了

This was a fun game; it seems to be missing something in the pacing that the first game had but on its own a good game.  The story for me was great and the ending was just WOW.  Only thing I didn’t like was the final battle, it just felt like a lot of work.
Птичку жалко...
Oyunun eksik olduğu yönler var. Çok iyi bir FPS değil ama hikayesi bütün eksilerini alıp götürür.
10 de 10, excelente juego, final genial con una historia impecable.
Игра просто шикарная! Она невообразимая, немыслимая, самая замечательная виртуальная вселенная в которой я когда либо находился! Всем советую, сюжет просто супер. Эта одна из самых моих любимых игр.
nice game 10/10
Can't wait for Bioshock in space, It's gonna be great
Great PC game. I highly recommened it.
Sin duda uno de los mejore juegos que he jugado, Recomendable.

엄청난 메타크리틱 점수와 함께 13년도 최고의 게임 반열에 올랐다.
엄청난 반전과 스토리를 가지고 있기때문에 큰 여운을 준 게임
OMFG THIS GAME MADE ME PISS MSELFF

В игре понравился сюжет который описывает все грани души нашего персонажа и возможные пути его развития. Сам город тоже достоен отдельного описания ведь он переносит нас с воды (как было в прошлызх частях серии) в небеса. Особенно понравились бои на аэротрассах. Не понравилось однообразие врагов и то что многие умения и оружие так же перенесли из прошлых игр!
故事和人物很棒
靓丽对我胃口的画面，战斗系统可圈可点，出彩的剧情，自带中文，简直完美，要把这个也重置了就好了
Definitely "Whoooa, DUDE!", I'm too lazy to think of something else, please, kill me
Great Story, Great Game Overall

Elizabeth: Booker, are you afraid of God?
Booker: No, but I'm afraid of you.
10/10

Прошло почти 4 года, но всё равно остаётся лучшей в своём роде

Beautiful game. The mechanics were not fun at all, though. It's not sure what to make of all that. The universe is well-designed, but I had no satisfaction playing. I had more fun watching a playthrough instead.

I'm convinced that this is a good game, but I would not recommend it beause I did not have a pleasant experience with it.
Есть за что заплатить.

One of the best story games I have ever played. I heard how great of a game Bioshock was and wanted to see it for myself in 2016. Even after 3 years (9 for the first) I was blown away by the incredibly detailed story. The ending had me think about this game constantly for about a week and looking up explanations to the end. All I can say about the end is that everything comes together in an explosion of realization. Definetly recommend, Have fun playing ;)
Best Game
Only 10 из 10

I can't think of any game more deserving of the "WHOOOAAAAAA, DUDE!" award than this! The ending blew my mind and I just sat there dumbfounded as the credits rolled by (first time I've ever sat through the entire credits of anything, not that I was reading them, I was just sitting there in shock and trying to put everything together in my head). Afterwards I had to go online and spent many hours watching different explanations and theories. I highly recommend this game and I hope it wins the award!
以电子游戏为载体描绘幻想世界的完美艺术品
its a game worth reviewing, its a good game

硬币硬币，我要硬币，没有硬币的我快要死了。

Jogo excelente, com jogabilidade extremamente fluída e divertida, história sensacional com plot twists, personagens carismáticos (especialmente Elizabeth) e gráficos estonteantes baseados em cel shading.

If you have not played this game yet it's like you really haven't started living.

Definitively this game is a MUST HAVE. I've played all the Bioshock games and currently wanting to buy all the DLC for this one.

EDIT*

Played all DLC's at a friend's house, great additional content, I do recommend purchasing this game with all DLC's. Already won the game 3 times, great gameplay, story, combat system, weapons, great from starting point to end!

best game ever.

11/10

This is one off the best story line games i have played And i hope to be able to play something like this again.
One of th best games I've played. Great story line, with an escort that doesn't walk slow or die all the time to stupid things. Yay!

Сюжет и ещё раз сюжет!

Pese a lo que dicen sobre este juego yo lo he disfrutado demasiado, me encanto su historia y como es que fue llevada.

Very good gameplay and story arc.
Мощный сюжет, куча психоделики, интересная графика и просто классная игра. Одна из игр, которая останется моим любимчиком навсегда!
Bioshock "infinite" - infinite likes
Best Game ever!! Should deff win "Test of Time!"
best bioshock by a landslide. great story + shooter.

Update 11-21-18:  Still holds up well.  The atmosphere and storytelling are first class.

If playing through any Bioshock game for the first time,  I recommend start with this one.  The story telling alone is phenomenal.

Awesome game, amazing graphics, fun gameplay.

Definetly deserves the “Whoooaaaaaaa, dude!” award.

The only game I ever pre-ordered, and it was totally worth it!  
Where it lacks in innovative gameplay dynamics, it makes up for an engaging, twisting story that keeps you thinking for days.  An amazing acheivement in story-telling and art.

Um jogo envolvente, com uma personagem BEM carismática que te dá vontade de (ter um caso com ela! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)) jogar sem parar! haha
Buenisima historia
